tasks.label: Compile and Run
tasks.command: clear; if [[ '${fileExtname}' == '.cpp' || '${fileExtname}' == '.cxx' || '${fileExtname}' == '.cc' ]]; then g++ -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension} ${file} && ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}; else gcc -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension} ${file} && ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}; fi
tasks.detail: Automatically compiles and runs C/C++ files using the appropriate compiler.
